glsa.title: Crack: Arbitrary code execution
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in Crack might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.

background.p: Crack is a really simple JSON and XML parsing Ruby gem, ripped from Merb and Rails.

description.p: An XML parameter parsing vulnerability has been discovered in Crack.

impact.p: A remote attacker could execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process, cause a Denial of Service condition, or bypass security restrictions.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Crack users should upgrade to the latest version:
